response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies greatly depending on its intended use or personal significance to you. With that in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the quality and rarity of the item, which I believe could easily fetch over $800,000 in the market. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 750000}
